item.title: About
item.description: I spend a fair share of my waking hours building software. In previous lives, I was trained as an Electrical Engineer and then spent a couple of years in a PhD program in Machine Learning and Computer Vision. Academia is a funny place, though that can be said of most other constellations humans arrange themselves in. The title of this site is a rare word that occurs in V., the debut novel of a certain Thomas Ruggles Pynchon, Jr.
